name: hackzpop: collection
description:
Experience hackzpop 1 and 2 like never before!

Are you tired of NORMAL gaming? Do you want MORE lazily ported old video-games? Well, then you're in luck!

Hackzpop Collection is the new trend! Play ALL of the old hackzpop games, right from a USB! Now available for only $79.99 (tax not included)

Beat all of the games for a surprise! What's the surprise? I don't know! Play now!

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys / Joystick / D-Pad - Move player / Move gamepad cursor
You can't stop moving!

Features

There's plenty of differences between the old versions and the new ones! We'll state a few for you!

- 16:9 60fps gameplay! (sorta)
- Full controller support!
- Discord Rich Presence! (for Windows and Linux only, sorry MacOS users)
- New modes!
- A new intuitive UI!

What are you waiting for? Play now!

Original Games:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/144889255/
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/211356805/
